title.narrative: Let Her Decide and Participate project-LHDP

description.narrative: Enable women to have sustainable access to opportunities and skills which facilitate increased confidence & leadership towards transformation of power that protects women's rights and promotes equal relationships. Before launch this project, numbers of preparatory tasks/activities requires to determine/validate the project activities up to project level including conduct the baseline survey

mailing-address.narrative: Oxfam House, John Smith Drive, Oxford, OX4 2JY

sector.narrative: Right to Equity: Gender and Diversity
